urlText: Lift at Birrong Station not available between the footbridge and platforms 1/2
content:
The lift between the footbridge and platforms 1/2 is temporarily out of service.

If you need help, ask staff or phone 02 9379 7727.
subtitle: Lift at Birrong Station not available between the footbridge and platforms 1/2
